event_description: Students attend an App Development competition conducted by Nokia
Nokia is acquired by Microsoft. NMIL -> MMIL.
The selected batch of The Innovation Lab interns participate in a virtual internship over the summer.
Final Mentor Intern Meeting for the Summer 2020 interns.
The first ever virtual HashCode. Going global.
The first iteration of The Innovation Lab's new brainchild.
The Decennial Hashcode, and the first offline event to be conducted on campus in 2022.
The first offline summer internship since COVID-19 hit commences!
Interns finally display their hard-work at Roadshow!
